Manual creative reviews and spreadsheet-driven budget modelling demanded specialized teams for data wrangling rather than strategic campaign improvements. Poor scalability of manual processes meant:
Business Case:
P&G uses a layered AI architecture combining generative models for creative ideation, predictive analytics for multivariate testing, and programmatic media buying to compress cycles and reduce costs. 

It will be:
- Fully autonomous campaign orchestration with minimal human oversight
- Hyper-personalized creative tailored to individual behavioral signals
- Cross-channel attribution models powered by deep-learning networks

Key Topics & Issues: Developing effective promotion strategies with Promo Advisor
Business Case: Promo Advisor is using machine learning to support commercial teams in managing promotions in an optimal way. It enables the planning and optimisation of targeted promotions, boosting sales and ROI
How (Technical):
Promo Advisor provides thee core functionalities. 

- First, the DECOMPOSER identifies the drivers behind successful promotions by analysing past promotions. 

- The SIMULATOR enables commerce teams to simulate and calculate the expected uplift from their planned promo calendars by testing different promotional scenarios at speed. 

- The OPTIMISER creates the optimal promotion calendar based on operational, financial, market and strategic constraints.
